Package smeen.component

Class StageArea

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
javafx.scene.layout.VBox
smeen.component.StageArea
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, Resettable, Savable
public class StageArea extends javafx.scene.layout.VBox implements Resettable, Savable
The stage area: where all the main action take place.

  • Property Summary

    Properties
    Type
    Property
    Description
    javafx.beans.property.IntegerProperty
    shownScene
    The order number of currently showing scene.
    javafx.beans.property.SetProperty<String>
    shownVariable
    A set of all variable that is being shown, updating this property will automatically add/remove necessary VariableDisplay node to this stage area content.

    • addAndRelocate

      public void addAndRelocate(javafx.geometry.Point2D pos, SpriteObject sprite)
      Add the given sprite to stage content and perform necessary calculations based on the given mouse position relative to scene.
      Parameters:
      pos - the mouse position relative to scene.
      sprite - the sprite to add.
